## coerce() function

Ensure an incoming value matches its datatype. For example, if user input is from a textfield, parse it.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function coerce(value: Value, dataType: DataType): Value;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | Value |  |
|  dataType | DataType |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Value
